reference.scope: INTERACTION WITH CNTN3; CNTN4; CNTN5 AND CNTN6

comment.text: Protein tyrosine phosphate + H(2)O = protein tyrosine + phosphate.
Monomer; active form. Homodimer; inactive form (Probable). Interacts with CNTN3, CNTN4, CNTN5 and CNTN6.
Found in a variety of tissues.
Belongs to the protein-tyrosine phosphatase family. Receptor class 5 subfamily.
